Module com.example.mycasinofx
Package com.example.mycasinofx.controllers.custom_dialog_stake

Class DialogControllerResult

java.lang.Object
com.example.mycasinofx.controllers.custom_dialog_stake.DialogControllerResult
public class DialogControllerResult extends Object
The DialogControllerResult class controls the dialog window displaying the result of a game. It manages updating result information, displaying result messages.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the controller. Creates a new page switch and get the player instance.

    • update21Result

      public void update21Result(int botValueAmn, int playerValueAmn, int result)
      Updates the dialog window with the result of a game of 21.
      Parameters:
      botValueAmn - The value of the bot's hand.
      playerValueAmn - The value of the player's hand.
      result - The result of the game (1 for player win, 2 for player lose, 0 for draw).

    • setMainPane

      public void setMainPane(javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane mainPane)
      Sets the main pane of the dialog.
      Parameters:
      mainPane - The main pane to set.

    • setFxmlType

      Sets the type of game to play again.
      Parameters:
      curGame - The type of game to play again.

      Handles the action of playing the game again.
